info.title: Football API - OpenAPI 3.0
info.description:
This a simple API to adminster objects related too football, such as players, teams, competitions, matches, etc.

Some useful links:
- [The API repository](https://github.com/ViniciusBessa/football-api)
- [The source API definition used](https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-petstore/blob/master/src/main/resources/openapi.yaml)

tags.name: auth
tags.description: Access endpoints to register, login and get info from users

tags.name: user
tags.description: Access endpoints to get, update and delete users

tags.name: country
tags.description: Access endpoints to get, create, update and delete countries

tags.name: position
tags.description: Access endpoints to get, create, update and delete positions

tags.name: competition
tags.description: Access endpoints to get, create, update and delete competitions

tags.name: season
tags.description: Access endpoints to get, create, update and delete seasons

tags.name: team
tags.description: Access endpoints to get, create, update and delete teams

tags.name: player
tags.description: Access endpoints to get, create, update and delete players

tags.name: trophy
tags.description: Access endpoints to get, create, update and delete trophes

tags.name: match
tags.description: Access endpoints to get, create, update and delete matches

tags.name: goal
tags.description: Access endpoints to get, create, update and delete goals

tags.name: transfer
tags.description: Access endpoints to get, create, update and delete transfers
